name: Tomb Raider: Unfinished Business
description:
Tomb Raider: Unfinished Business is an action-shooter game developed by Core Design. It came out on 01-01-1997. It was published by Eidos Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tomb Raider: Unfinished Business is available on PC.
It was produced by Mike Schmitt. It was scored by Nathan McCree.
